conversations.description: Professor uploads a PDF of a chemistry chapter, the system extracts key concepts, creates a linear SCORM module with slide titles and auto‑generated multiple‑choice quizzes.
High‑school teacher provides a video lecture (MP4) on World War II, the LLM transcribes it, pulls out learning objectives, and builds an interactive video SCORM package with checkpoint questions.
English literature instructor imports a DOCX of Shakespeare's Hamlet, the app extracts themes and characters, then generates slide‑by‑slide analysis and short‑answer assessment items.

Math tutor uploads a set of existing quiz bank CSV files, merges them with newly identified concepts from a textbook PDF, and produces a branched SCORM module that adapts difficulty based on learner answers.
Corporate trainer uploads a PDF of a compliance handbook, the system extracts policy concepts, creates a linear SCORM course with true/false questions and a final certification quiz.
Science educator supplies a mixed‑media folder (PDF, MP4, and images); the app transcribes the video, extracts text, and assembles an interactive video SCORM module with embedded diagrams.
Language instructor uploads a PDF of a Spanish grammar guide, the LLM identifies verb conjugation rules, builds slides with example sentences, and generates fill‑in‑the‑blank exercises.
History professor provides a scanned PDF of primary source documents; the system extracts excerpts, suggests discussion prompts, and creates a branched SCORM module for inquiry‑based learning.
Art teacher uploads a PDF portfolio of famous paintings, the LLM suggests slide titles highlighting artistic movements, and adds matching multiple‑choice questions on style identification.
Physics lecturer uploads lecture notes and a lab video; the platform creates an interactive video SCORM with embedded lab safety checkpoints and calculation quizzes.
Medical educator uploads a PDF of anatomy diagrams, the system extracts anatomical terms, builds slide decks with zoomable images, and creates labeling assessment items.
Finance trainer uploads a PDF of investment fundamentals, the LLM extracts concepts like risk tolerance, then generates scenario‑based branching quizzes in a linear SCORM course.
Environmental science instructor provides a video documentary; the app transcribes, identifies climate‑change concepts, and builds an interactive video module with reflection questions.
Music teacher uploads sheet music PDFs, the LLM extracts key signatures and tempo markings, creates slides with audio samples, and adds short‑answer theory questions.
Software engineering mentor uploads a PDF of algorithm explanations, the system extracts steps, builds code‑snippet slides, and generates debugging‑style multiple‑choice questions.
Philosophy professor provides a PDF of Kant's Critique, the LLM identifies core arguments, creates a branched SCORM course that routes learners based on comprehension checks.
Elementary teacher uploads a set of picture books in PDF, the app extracts story arcs, creates animated slide decks, and adds true/false comprehension quizzes.

Trainer uploads a video of a sales pitch role‑play; the system transcribes, highlights persuasion techniques, and creates an interactive video SCORM with pause‑and‑respond prompts.
Language lab uploads an audio‑only MP3 of pronunciation drills; the LLM transcribes, extracts phonetic concepts, and builds slides with waveform visuals and short‑answer listening tests.
Teacher uploads a PDF curriculum map; the system extracts unit objectives, builds a high‑level overview SCORM module with navigation links to detailed lessons.
